places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Peak Bound
address: Teh, Panchrukhi, Chhatar, Himachal Pradesh 176103, India

reviews.text: I happened to be at Hotel Peak Bound a few days back at my neice's marriage. All the things were taken care of very nicely. The rooms and the cuisine were very good. The manager and staff members assisted us very well in the best possible manner. The rooms were elegant and luxurious. I myself found the place very nice for any kind of occasion....Consider my review if you are looking for a place for marriage, ring ceremonies, birthday parties etc.

Very nice hotel, we had great experience and we all enjoyed a lot during our stay. Great ambiance and staff is very good at their work and well trained.😀👍. The quality of food is also amazing. Thanks for making our stay and event memorable and enjoyable.we had a great and even new kind of experience of hospitality as the staff here was so helpful. Again thank you so much for making our event memorable.We would like to visit again soon.

I Stayed in the hotel this month with my family. It is very neat and clean hotel and staff is also very nice.
I wanted to mention that I forgot my Shirt in the hotel and after coming back from the hotel when I called the hotel staff they confirmed it and couriered my shirt to my address. Very honest staff.
I recommend to choose this hotel for your safe and enjoyable stay.
Thanks

Best place for marriage. Food is awesome. Arrangements,staff, ambiance everything is perfect. Perfect place . budget friendly. I m fully satisfied with this place. Specially kewal kishan g is very good in handling and managing things. A big thanks to hotel peak bound for making my marriage so special.

I recently had the pleasure of booking this Hotel for my Sister's wedding on 14th Feb, 2024 and I couldn't be happier with the experience. From start to finish, everything was seamless and professional.

The staff at the hotel went above and beyond to ensure that every detail was taken care of. The event spaces were beautifully decorated, and the ambiance was just right for a joyous celebration.

The rooms were spacious, comfortable, and well-appointed. The hotel's attention to cleanliness and hygiene was commendable.

The catering team prepared a delectable spread that catered to various tastes and dietary preferences. Our guests raved about the flavors and presentation.

What truly stood out was the personalized services we received by the hotel staff and specially the Manager (Mr. K.K Sharma). The Manager is at your service before and during the event. No matter what the time is, he is always there to assist you.

I highly recommend Hotel Peak Bound for anyone planning a wedding or any special occasion. The hotel can easily accommodate 250-300 persons at a time.

places_with_reviews.name: Do Pal Hotel & Restaurant
address: palampur, 3HHR+96V, Mandi - Pathankot Rd, Sungal, Mat, Himachal Pradesh 176061, India

reviews.text: Very good food and great people, location is at its best, wheel chair entrance and yumm.....!

This is the best restaurant to have tasty pure veg food.
All the dishes were tasty and freshly prepared, just homely like experience.
We ordered sandwiches, puri bhaaji and paratha.

What a place... If u want to eat food which we made in our home then u should definately try this restaurant.
Staff is friendly and kind
Food are awesome
Owner is very kind and humble.
At last I would like to say that this restaurant deserves 5 star.

Very gud family restaurant.  Well cooperated staff. This restaurant is value for money.  I have taken dinner last tym and mutton curry was awesome. Lime soda they make is great.. very gud point in palampur  baijnath road....

After a highly energetic and tiring ride, we stopped at this restruant which was the only place open anyways. We ordered Veg biryani and raitha and at that late hours they gave us piping hot biryani. The taste and texture was just amazing. Will surely recommend this place if you are mid way between Palampur and Baijnath.
